Detailed Description

Type: Class

Purpose: This is the general 4D-LUT Xform

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CIccXform4DLut::CIccXform4DLut ( CIccTag *  pTag)

Name: CIccXform4DLut::CIccXform4DLut

Purpose: Constructor

Args: pTag = Pointer to the tag of type CIccMBB

References CIccTag::IsMBBType().

Name: CIccXform4DLut::~CIccXform4DLut

Member Function Documentation

void CIccXform4DLut::Apply ( CIccApplyXform *  pApply,
icFloatNumber *  DstPixel,
const icFloatNumber *  SrcPixel 
) const
virtual

Name: CIccXform4DLut::Apply

Purpose: Does the actual application of the Xform.

Args: pApply = ApplyXform object containging temporary storage used during Apply DstPixel = Destination pixel where the result is stored, SrcPixel = Source pixel which is to be applied.

Implements CIccXform.

icStatusCMM CIccXform4DLut::Begin ( )
virtual

Name: CIccXform4DLut::Begin

Purpose: Does the initialization of the Xform before Apply() is called. Must be called before Apply().

Reimplemented from CIccXform.

References CIccCurve::Begin(), CIccXform::Begin(), icCmmStatInvalidLut, icCmmStatInvalidProfile, and icCmmStatOk.

LPIccCurve * CIccXform4DLut::ExtractInputCurves ( )
virtual

Name: CIccXform4DLut::ExtractInputCurves

Purpose: Gets the input curves. Should be called only after Begin() has been called. Once the curves are extracted, they will not be used by the Apply() function. WARNING: caller owns the curves and must be deleted by the caller.

Return: Pointer to the input curves.

Implements CIccXform.

LPIccCurve * CIccXform4DLut::ExtractOutputCurves ( )
virtual

Name: CIccXform4DLut::ExtractOutputCurves

Purpose: Gets the output curves. Should be called only after Begin() has been called. Once the curves are extracted, they will not be used by the Apply() function. WARNING: caller owns the curves and must be deleted by the caller.

Return: Pointer to the output curves.

Implements CIccXform.

inlinevirtual

Implements CIccXform.

References icXformType4DLut.
